modName: Realistic Lighting With Customization and Imaginator colorful config by olbins
summary: My configuration of RLwC and Imaginator to make Skyrim a bit more eyecandy.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Warning: This is configuration file for Realistic Lighting With Customization v3.5 but since it is no more so this file is archive for ppl who still wan\'t to use 3.5. I strongly suggest to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url][/b]

[b]Welcome.[/b]
I\'ve decided to share my configuration files and settings.
For a long time I was trying to make my Skyrim more colorful. I was using Project MATSO but as ENB it was killing my fps. Yes i use alot of mods and hd textures. Finaly i found perfect combination which is Realistic Lighting With Customization plus Imaginator.
My configuration gives bright days and dark but visible nights. Interiors looks nice and dungeons are also quite dark.

[b]Instalation:[/b]
Unpack files into data folder.
Ingame Imaginator menu set:
Presets:
-Pixar preset (or 2x to get more \"juicy\" effect)
Tintor:
-one click on orange
-one click on yellow
Cinemagic:
-decrease Sky 18x (its up to you how much but the 0 is too bright)
Contrastor:
-five clicks to increase +1 to Contrast
-two clicks to increase +10 to Saturation
-three clicks to decrease -1 Brightness
Summary:
Yellow: 1
Orange: 1
Saturation: 20
Contrast: 5
Brightness: -3
Sky: 18

[b]Darker Nights version.[/b]
Still not pitch black but in a cloudy night you better stick to the roads. Imaginator values as above, just the [b]brightness set to -15[/b]. 
Higly recommend to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605]CLARALUX - More and Brighter Lights by MyGoodEye[/url]. This mod gives much brighter lights suited to this darker nights than Lanterns of Skyrim. Use v2 version and wait for v5 which is very promissing judging by v4-test-ver.


Ofcourse you can change those values to fit your preferences.

[b]Some mods i use:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043]Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All In One by MannyGT[/url] - you can try 2x brighter preset, but its too yellow for my taste
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605]CLARALUX - More and Brighter Lights by MyGoodEye[/url] - sugested for Darker Nights version
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8739]EDWS - Enhanced Dynamic Weather System by Zappoo[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16541]Real Rain by PlayerTw0[/url] - Basic with RealRainBWRLWC2_2 optional file
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15506]Lightning during Thunder Storms by Minty[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20801]Texture Pack Combiner by Cestral[/url] - almost all optional mods

[b]Credits:[/b]
Plutoman101 for Realistic Lighting With Customization
MGE for IMAGINATOR
author: olbins
